actions.name: AssociateAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to set the AWS Firewall Manager administrator account and enables the service in all organization accounts

actions.name: AssociateThirdPartyFirewall
actions.description: Grants permission to set the Firewall Manager administrator as a tenant administrator of a third-party firewall service

actions.name: BatchAssociateResource
actions.description: Grants permission to associate resources to an AWS Firewall Manager resource set

actions.name: BatchDisassociateResource
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate resources from an AWS Firewall Manager resource set

actions.name: DeleteAppsList
actions.description: Grants permission to permanently deletes an AWS Firewall Manager applications list

actions.name: DeleteNotificationChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Firewall Manager association with the IAM role and the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic that is used to notify the FM administrator about major FM events and errors across the organization

actions.name: DeletePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to permanently delete an AWS Firewall Manager policy

actions.name: DeleteProtocolsList
actions.description: Grants permission to permanently deletes an AWS Firewall Manager protocols list

actions.name: DeleteResourceSet
actions.description: Grants permission to permanently delete an AWS Firewall Manager resource set

actions.name: DisassociateAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate the account that has been set as the AWS Firewall Manager administrator account and and disables the service in all organization accounts

actions.name: DisassociateThirdPartyFirewall
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Firewall Manager administrator from a third-party firewall tenant

actions.name: GetAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to return the AWS Organizations account that is associated with AWS Firewall Manager as the AWS Firewall Manager administrator

actions.name: GetAppsList
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager applications list

actions.name: GetComplianceDetail
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve detailed compliance information about the specified member account. Details include resources that are in and out of compliance with the specified policy

actions.name: GetNotificationChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic that is used to record AWS Firewall Manager SNS logs

actions.name: GetPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager policy

actions.name: GetProtectionStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve policy-level attack summary information in the event of a potential DDoS attack

actions.name: GetProtocolsList
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager protocols list

actions.name: GetResourceSet
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager resource set

actions.name: GetThirdPartyFirewallAssociationStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the onboarding status of a Firewall Manager administrator account to third-party firewall vendor tenant

actions.name: GetViolationDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve violations for a resource based on the specified AWS Firewall Manager policy and AWS account

actions.name: ListAppsLists
actions.description: Grants permission to return an array of AppsListDataSummary objects

actions.name: ListComplianceStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of PolicyComplianceStatus objects in the response. Use PolicyComplianceStatus to get a summary of which member accounts are protected by the specified policy

actions.name: ListDiscoveredResources
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of resources in the organization's accounts that are available to be associated with a resource set

actions.name: ListMemberAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of member account ids if the caller is FMS admin account

actions.name: ListPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of PolicySummary objects in the response

actions.name: ListProtocolsLists
actions.description: Grants permission to return an array of ProtocolsListDataSummary objects

actions.name: ListResourceSetResources
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of resources that are currently associated to a resource set

actions.name: ListResourceSets
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of ResourceSetSummary objects

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list Tags for a given resource

actions.name: ListThirdPartyFirewallFirewallPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all of the third-party firewall policies that are associated with the third-party firewall administrator's account

actions.name: PutAppsList
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Firewall Manager applications list

actions.name: PutNotificationChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to designate the IAM role and Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic that AWS Firewall Manager (FM) could use to notify the FM administrator about major FM events and errors across the organization

actions.name: PutPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Firewall Manager policy

actions.name: PutProtocolsList
actions.description: Grants permission to creates an AWS Firewall Manager protocols list

actions.name: PutResourceSet
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Firewall Manager resource set

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add a Tag to a given resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a Tag from a given resource
